choices.text:
Write a python function to calculate the average and standard deviation of a list of numbers
def avg_std(nums):
    total = sum(nums)
    count = len(nums)
    
    avg = total / count
    
    squared_differences = [x - avg for x in nums]
    square_sum = sum(squared_differences)
    variance = square_sum / (count - 1.0)
    
    standard_deviation = variance**0.5
